results.content:
Though this course does go through how to set up a professional looking website,  there are areas that just weren't covered.

It seems to skip a lot of things like what sort of images you should use, and where you might be able to get them from.

Also it mentioned nothing about Keywords or SEO, which is an essential part of the blog building process.
results.content_html:
Though this course does go through how to set up a professional looking website, there are areas that just weren't covered.

It seems to skip a lot of things like what sort of images you should use, and where you might be able to get them from.

Also it mentioned nothing about Keywords or SEO, which is an essential part of the blog building process.

results.content: Instructor was engaging & explained steps in simple layman terms that even I (a newbie) could understand.  The structure was good & covered the basics.  My only complaint is that is just the basics - I hope he will follow up with more in depth course.  Not taking any points away because this was a beginners course & he did the job.  Thanks!!

My only complaint is that is just the basics - I hope he will follow up with more in depth course. Not taking any points away because this was a beginners course & he did the job. Thanks!!

results.content: This course cut right to it. No fluff. The course was different from other courses I have taken. The course uses no powerpoint, which was an interesting way. The graphics were great on the animations. The content really helped with my blog. I had my blog live already but used many of the tips to help enhance my blog. I will continue to use tips to further enhance my blog.
